LanguageData.VMF_Settings.DrawPlanet: Draw the world map during caravan.
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.RoofedPatch: Refer also to roofed on base map for roofed on vehicle map.\n(Impact to performance)
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.WeightFactor: Weight factor of things on the vehicle map.
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.ThreadingPathCost: Multi-threading for path cost calculations on large vehicles.
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.MinAreaForThreading: Minimum area of vehicle calculated in multi-threading.
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.AsyncClosestThing: Multi-threading of calculations to get closest reachable thing.
LanguageData.VMF_Settings.MinSearchSetCount: Minimum search set count calculated in multi-threading.
